jungle what now? "the crate depression"? bot crisis? no updates in years?

wow dude you must've hit your head hard; now come on! love and war just dropped and we're all having a conga party!

This game is a perfect balance between addicting and engaging. TF2 is a bit hard to get hang of as a newbie ( I'm not sure if it was just me sry) but once you play it, oh boy, nothing's better! Definitely a Plus from me.

На сервер зашли боты
.
.
Решили с командой их кикнуть
.
.
Боты кикнули всю команду

12/10

This amazing FPS shooter based off of Team-Fortress Classic (fanmade mod supported by valve for half life) has held up over a whole decade of endless fun. There are many modes to pick from such as Competitive and Casual. It isn't all just combat however, you can mess around with  friends and test different classes. I personally love the Scout class as Melee is my specialty. Would recommend for all ages.
amount of money spent on skins is unreal, bots are everywhere, and hackers kill u from 1000 miles away. 10/10
It is fun game would recommend. 10 out of 10 would play again.

This game is unplayable, bots in every single casual game for 1 whole year now. Valve doesn't deserve this amazing community. Making f2p's unable to use the chat 'cause that's gonna fix the aimbot problem, right? If you want to suffer just go play league of legends. TF2 will die and it's going to be just valve's fault.
what can i say, good game with bots included!
dançei com os casas durante 30 segundos, andamos o mapa inteiro até tomarmos uma unica bala, todos morreram, não recomendo

Bom primeiro de tudo essa é minha opinião então n venha criticar
Team Fortress 2 ou TF2 é um jogo da minha infância querendo ou n é um jogo muito bom pra quem quer começar na steam,mas tem um problema para quem quer jogar só ele de graça é que a valve tira tudo de bom para quem quer começar agora,pq vc n pode falar com as pessoas nen no chat de vos ou o chat mesmo vc tem que COMPRAR o jogo,na minha opinião isso é capitalismo e n sei pq adicionar um negocio chato desses o pior que eles decidirão por isso para diminuir os ''BOTS'' n sei como isso diminui mas ok,continuando o jogo não é pagar para ganhar o jogo é muitu bom nesse critério e os hats isso n muda na jogatina pq se não o jogo seria ''pagar para ganhar'' certo não é VALVE FILHA DA P... Mas esse jogo é bom demais e não é por isso que vou parar de jogar pq se não vou ter que jogar CS e vamos por na mesa é um jogo para competir e eu n gosto disso.
Bom essa foi minha opinião (isso a valve n vai arrumar ta vou deixar bem claro)
Se vcs quiser eu entro mas afundo nisso só comentarem o que vcs querem que eu escreverei
Muito obg pela atenção de vc leitor e jogador do TF2 
E um bom dia, boa tarde ou boa noite. <3
игра норм  , сам играю за инжинера
Gran juego divierte muchos y los personajes son perfectos

i hate this game with a passion
other than that it's ok
the classes in the game are cool and the game design is awesome, i reccomend the game to anyone who llikes fps shooters and fun.
My childhood and now my adulthood. One of the most played games on steam with an active economy and playerbase and Valve still decides to ignore it :/ whyyyyyyyy

ЧИТЕРОВ ТОННА ХОТИТЕ НОРМ ИГРАТЬ НЕТ ЛИБО ЧИТЕР ЛИБО КИБЕР КОТЛЕТАА СТИ Я НЕ ИЗМЕНИ МНЕНИЯ ПОКА ЭТУ ПАРАШУ НЕ ПОФИКСЯТ

Now and then I think of when I used to play you
Like when I said it felt fun even when I'd die
I tell myself that you're still right for me
But I hear little from your company
But that is love and it's an ache I'll always feel

You can get addicted to a certain kind of sadness
Like resignation to the end, always the end
But when you found that we did not make sense
I'd still come back and play attack/defense
I'll admit that I am sad that it is over

But you didn't have to cut us off
Make out like it never happened and that we were nothing
We still really need your love
But I wanna sell my stranges and that feels so rough

No, you didn't have to stoop so low
Leave us with the bots for a year
Then, finally change the system
I guess that we don't need that though

Now you're just a shooter that I used to know
Now you're just a shooter that I used to know
Now you're just a shooter that I used to know

Now and then, I think of all the times you screwed us over
But had me believing it was something we didn't do
But I don't wanna live that way
Reading into every word you say (GabeN)
You said you wouldn't let us go
And we wouldn't catch you hung up on
Some projects that would never grow

But you didn't have to cut us off
Make out like it never happened and that we were nothing
And we still just really need some love
But you treat us like we're strangers and that feels so rough

And you didn't have to stoop so low
Leave us with the bots for a year
Then, finally change the system
I guess that we don't need that though

Now you're just a shooter that we used to know

Игра если можно ЭТО так назвать тупая и сложноая в понимании и будет только понятна для тупых eблaнов! Так же в этот шлaк просто невозможно играть, не верится что это убoжество создали те люди, которые создавали такие игры как хайф лайф и портал!

Интереснейший онлайн шутер с кучей механик и шапок. По праву бессмертная и весёлая игра. Не без минусов, но по праву занимающая место в моём сердце. Советую.

Jogo Multiplayer F2P muito bom, apesar no começo você morrer MUITAS vezes, quanto mais vc vai jogando, mais vc vai aprendendo como funciona cada classe. A restrição do chat e de pedir "Medic" ppara f2p's não atrapalha. Sem falar dos cosméticos, re-skins, armas e a explosão de dopamina ao ganhar um random crit (mesmo sendo uma mecânica ruim).
